title: Extra-low voltage (ELV)
fullText:
Not exceeding 50 V a.c. or 120 V ripple-free d.c.
NOTES:
1 For the purposes of this Standard, a nominal 120 V d.c. battery system is considered LV.
2 The open circuit voltage on PV arrays at STC (standard test conditions) as per AS/NZS 5033 will affect the maximum voltage that may be experienced in a stand-alone system (e.g. the cables).
